"You appear eager to begin our workout, so I should prepare myself."

         Shurimon throws off their clothes like lightning, and you get a good look at their body. They didn't bother removing their mask, however, you could clearly identify their gender. You approached your training partner and took note of their striking features. You were greeted by...
1112222122.title: Training with Shurimon.

11122222.content: You don't like the last choice? That's no problem. How about choosing Gatomon? She was once a servant, but perhaps she would rather be the master this time. We can continue to more choices if you would like.
11122222.title: Mistress Gatomon?

111222221.content:
As your captor emerged out of the darkness to greet the new 'slave', questions came to mind. Who was this captor? What exactly was it they wanted from you, and will you ever see home again? At least one of your questions gets answered. Your new master... is a cat! Oh, but not just any cat. A cute cat with blue eyes, purple hairs on her cat-ears, a purple and white striped tail, and yellow paws with red stripes. Hang on a sec... that looks like a Digimon! And you know exactly what Digimon this cat is!

"Uh...Gatomon?"

         You ask what you presume is a female. Gatomon responds by smiling at you....just before arching her back and pouncing on your lap! That causes you to fall over, luckily the soft dirt ground breaks your fall, while you break Gatomon's fall! Normally you would get back up and push her off you.... but you cant get your arms out from behind your back! Gatomon tied your arms together. Guess she thought this out to while she was kidnapping you! Nonetheless, you struggle to break your arms free of that rope with little success... but you stop right after she brandishes her claws!

"Uh uh uh!"

         She waves a clawed finger in your face, before raising it into the air. You don't know what she has planned, but you do know it doesn't look well at the moment.

"You better behave! These claws aren't just for show! Watch!"

*SLLLLLAASSSHHH!!*

"AAHH!!"

         Before you knew it she took a swipe at you! You flinch out of fear of the strike....but it did not hurt! The good news is her claws did not penetrate you. The bad news is they tore your shirt to shreds!

"Hey!!! That was a brand new shirt!!"

         You shout and start to lose your temper a bit. Too bad she just giggles at you in response to your little outburst. You throw what remains of your shirt on the ground.

"Heh! Not like you are going to need it anyway, slave!"

"Ugh... just be thankful she can digivolve into Angewomon!"

"Now now, do not be so upset."

         Gatomon smiled at you with a flirtatious look on her face. You think it cannot get much worse, but that is until you heard what Gatomon had planned for you next.

"Now give your master a kiss."

"...A what?! ...A what?!"

"You heard your master! Give her a kiss!"

         She tells you while moving a little closer to you. You consider moving away and even running. Though remembering the earlier display changes your mind soon enough

"C'mon. It is not going to kill you."

         ...A kiss? Gatomon wants you to kiss her? Kiss a Digimon?! But you only met her like seconds ago! Well, it's not like she is giving you much of a choice. Besides, she is probably just toying with her little slave. But what you do know is she has claws and they are very sharp! They tore through that shirt of yours. Better do what she says before they end up tearing through the skin. Where is it you'll kiss your master?
111222221.title: Cat-Scratch Fever!

choices: She puts a shock collar on you.
1112222211.content:
You lean forward to kiss your new mistress. Thinking that maybe you could free your self if you played the slave for a while. Gatomon seemed to be satisfied.

"Are you pleased, Mistress?"

         You say, but do not mean a single word of it at the time. Gatomon does not seem to take much notice, of your sarcastic reply at the moment.

"Oh yes, I can tell you will be a good slave."

         You take a shot at freedom, by deciding to point out the obvious. You do not know if Gatomon will go for it, but escape is the only thing on your mind now.

"I might serve you better if these ropes are cut."

         Gatomon laughed softly and put one of her claws on your forehead. You do not move, remembering just what those claws of hers are capable of.

"Oh sweety, I wasn't born yesterday."

         You give up the act, since Gatomon is not buying the whole thing. You try to come up with another plan. Perhaps you could intimidate the small Digimon? That was the only thought that came to you, so you decide to give it a try.

"Listen up, you cannot just kidnap me, I have rights! I am an American! I-"

         Gatomon cuts you off, before turning to you, with a glare in her eyes. She snaps at you harshly and slaps you. Lucky for you, she did not use her claws.

"Well were not in America, now are we?! Now slave..."
1112222211.title: Nice try, but no.

11122222111.content:
"This should make you easier to control."

         She says, and briefly hops off you to dash into another room. You try to get up, but your feet are bound as well. Gatomon comes back into the room with a thin, metal collar. Seeing you squirm she strokes your hair.

"calm down, I will not hurt you...much"

         A smirk forms in the corner of her mouth. She snaps the collar around your neck. It is a bit too tight, but you can still barely manage to breathe.

"Why are you doing this?"

"ssshhhhhh"

         Gatomon clips a leash on the collar. This whole situation keeps getting more and more humiliating, as time continues to pass. You dislike what she says next even less.

"You're my new pet."

         She strokes your hair a few times, then with a few slashes of her claws, she frees your arms and legs. As soon as this happens, you reach to ring her little neck, but you're stopped by a searing electric shock from the collar.

"Bad human, BAD!"

         She said, in a commercial imitation of a little girl disciplining her dog. The shock stops when you curled over in pain on the floor. With some effort, you get back on your hands and knees.

"You are just restless, let's go for a walk"

         She tugs on the leash a few times. Escape might have been possible earlier, but now with that collar on you, any possibility of that has long since faded.

"You want to go, for a walk?"

         Pet seems to be a step up from slave however, it implies that your an animal. So, should you go or should you refuse and stay put?
11122222111.title: Cat with a pet human.

choices: In a Mountain town of caves.
111222221111.content:
You nod, and get up before taking a few steps. You once again felt the painful shock coursing through you. The shock stops after dropping to your knees.

"What the hell was that for!?"

         Gatomon gives a sharp tug on the leash, and almost chokes you. You try to get up, but Gatomon tugs on the leash again and you fall back to the ground.

"No human, bad! Walk on all fours, like pets are supposed to!"

         You stare at her blankly, not believing she is making you do this. You don't know if it's bravery, or if it's just foolishness that makes you protest the treatment.

"You cannot be serious."

         You start to get back up, but she shocks you again. The shocks were little more than annoying at first, but now they are getting quite painful.

"Sit"

         You stagger backward into a wall, dizzy from three shocks in a row. Solemnly you drop to your hands and knees in total defeat.

"Good boy"

         She tosses a cookie at you. As demeaning as it is you do not want to get shocked again, so you eat the cookie, off the cave floor with just your mouth. After walking through the cave a long time you come to an opening. When your eyes adjust to the light you see that you are...
111222221111.title: Sit boy!

1112222211111.content:
"All right human, you can take a rest because soon we will scale it."

         Gatomon says. After four grueling hours, you finally manage to scale Mt. infinity. The climb was much easier for Gatomon than it was for you. At least the experience is over for now.

"Good human."

         Gatomon says as she tosses you a cookie. You still object to being treated like this by the small Digimon, but you gladly eat the cookie anyway.

"Let's go home."

         Those words were music to your ears. At least the walk home is uneventful, and one that you actually do not mind for the first time today.

"All right master."
1112222211111.title: On MT. Infinity.

11122222112.content:
"...I am going to have some fun."

         She says as she runs her claw down your face. You flinch slightly when you feel a quick, sharp pain in your cheek. It fades, after only a few seconds.

"Do not be a baby, it is just a scratch."

         Says Gatomon, while still sitting on top of you. Fear of getting hurt worse prompts you to stay down until she's finished. She takes a few strands of hair and pulls them out with one swift tug. Gatomon giggles as you wince from the pain.

"Tee hee, you are such a frail creature."
11122222112.title: A darker side of Gatomon.

111222221121.content:
The wicked glint you see in her eyes kind of scares you! You would make a break for it...if you could. Hell, if you were not tied up, you would strangle that little demonic cat by now! Sure you are a cat-lover and all, but this goes far beyond the line. Nothing to do but grit your teeth, with every single strand of hair on your head she pricks off. Though, it's not the pain that scares you the most. It is the fact Gatomon is purring happily as she licks off any blood that spills out!

"98....99.....100!"

"EYAAAAGGGHHH!!!"

         The hundredth hair hurt the most out of all of them! That must have been pretty deep in your skin...or she probably pulled out more hair than she is telling you!

"Aw... did that hurt a little too much?"

         She feigns sympathy to your pain; she even goes as far as to stroke your hair like a pet! This angers you some, but Gatomon just continues ignoring you.

"Not to worry, fun time is over. I understand how frail and delicate a weak creature like you is."

         Grr!! If you weren't tied up you would have ripped her cute little tail off to 'repay her kindness! Seriously though, someone like this digivolves into Angewomon?! There is no way a heartless beast like this can turn into a noble angel!!! Unfortunately now was not the time to be asking philosophical questions, because she was not done with you!

"All that playtime must have worn you out."

         Gatomon said as she patted your cheek. Gatomon sports a smile on her face. You have no idea what she is smiling about, but it does not take long to find out.

"I have got just the thing to pick you right back up!"

"W...What?"

         You ask out of curiosity. In nary a split second, Gatomon dashed off. But before you could even think about running away while she is gone, she dashed right back into your lap...with a bottle of milk in her paw! A cat offering you milk. How cute.

"Here! Full of vitamins and minerals, guaranteed to make you strong, get your juices flowing, last out through even the toughest conditions, and regain your energy. Because later, you are going to need all the energy you can get! Now open wide!"

"N...no thanks, I...I'm not thirsty."

         You refuse, but still, try to be polite even though you are getting a bit nervous. It looks like milk, but who knows what the cat Digimon is planning for you next.

"BAD choice! Open your mouth, or I am going to tear holes in your stomach, and pour it in them! Either way, it is going in your tummy!"

         She continues smiling as she brandishes her claws. It definitely does not seem wise to argue with her at this point. You gulp hard, and open your mouth, and allow her to pour the whole damn bottle of milk down your throat!

         Much if it runs down your chin and neck, but Gatomon happily licks up the runoff! After only a few minutes of drinking the milk, you start to feel a little queasy. Not just queasy, but kind of dizzy as well. It feels like the world is about to spin around in circles any moment!

"Good boy! That will give you the nice pleasant rest you need...before serving the other me!"

"...O..Other you?!"

         You question the last part she said. But by then, you are barely able to maintain focus! The world s blurring out of your vision. All that keeps you company is Gatomon's 'soothing' voice!

"Yep! Let me just say, she cannot wait to get her hands on you!"

         WHO?! The OTHER Gatomon?! But who could...she...oh my god, she drugged the milk! Again she was messing with you! You want to scream out loud, but you are too tired. You just want to sleep! With a quick thud, you close your eyes and fall to the ground. The last thing you saw was Gatomon...licking her lips in anticipation!

"Goodnight slave!"

************************************

"Rise and shine. Did you have a good nap?"

         A slightly older, seductive female voice, wakes you from your gentle sleep. You hoped all that mess earlier was all just a bad dream...only to be saddened by the fact that it wasn't! You came face-to-face with another Digimon form. An Ultimate-level Digimon! Worse even, you recognized that slightly wicked smirk across her lips. You found out what Gatomon meant, by 'the other her'! Say hello to...
111222221121.title: The OTHER You?

1112222211212.content:
As you vision slowly returns; the new image of you mistress fades into focus. She is a tall intimidating creature, human looking but with a pale, light gray skin and tight black leather top. Her left hand (claw) was a good bit larger than the right.

         Chains are wrapped around both arms and the top of her face covered by a black leather mask. Long, silverish-gray hair laid over a pair of large, demonic black wings. You jump up and notice that you're untied. You look at the demonic figure in front of you. It definitely was not what you were expecting to see.

"But I-I thought Gatomon became angels."

         You say as you slowly back away. She laughed, slightly mechanically. Her laugh sends a bit of a chill, down your spine. You thought Gatomon was bad, but it looks like it just got much worse.

"Only if they're good to shoes."

         She stepped toward you, looking down. Even on your feet, your mistress towered over you. You wrack your brain for an idea, but cannot think of anything.

"Go ahead and run I like a challenge."

         Your heart starts pounding; should you run? You're untied, but at this point, your captor is much stronger and faster than you are. You decide to...
1112222211212.title: Bigger is worse.

11122222112121.content:
Instinct tells you to run, but common sense tells you to stay. As much as you fear the she-devil's wrath if you run you fear her hospitality even more! Besides...it felt as if she wanted you to run.

         Nonetheless, you turned around and ran as fast as you could! But no matter how far much you ran, it did not feel like you were getting anywhere. You could not see the outside of the cave, but it did not seem like it was because it was a very big cave. To make things even stranger, when you looked over your shoulder, LadyDevimon was not running after you. She was slowly walking toward you as if she knew you would not escape.

         The ground started to rumble, and you heard the sound of something break through the earth and grab you by your leg! It was a chain! It wrapped around your leg too tight to break free of. You could not move. You could pry your legs free with your hands, but by the time you thought of that, more chains broke out of the ceiling and bound your arms!

         Each chain was squeezing as tightly as possible, but not enough to hurt you. With each gentle step she took, you could hear it echo throughout the room. LadyDevimon looked down at your small, chained body and smiled. You do not know if you are more scared or relieved at her smiling face.

"Was that it? I said I wanted a challenge."

         The little leather demonic face on her shoulder giggled. If you weren't scared before, the small talking demon face certainly didn't make it any better.

"Don't worry little guy!"

         The she-devil bent down next to you and looked you straight in the eye. You just keep getting more and more uncomfortable, as time continues to go by.

"I am not gonna punish you. After all, not many humans that come across one of us live to tell about it!"

         You are anything but relieved to hear that! You do not want to find out either. You would rather stay living than find out what happened to the others she mentioned.

"Uh...uh...D...Devimon, wh-"

"LadyDevimon!!"

         She slapped you hard, thankfully with her human-like hand! But it was about 40 times stronger than when she was Gatomon! It hurt so bad, it caused you to spit on contact!

"I am a girl, you know."

"UGH!! S...Sorry...I mean LadyDevimon..."

"Yes,"

         She tilted her head and smiled sweetly. At least as sweetly as a demon Digimon could anyway. This does very little to put you at ease.

"W... what are you gonna do with me?"

         You built up the courage to ask. Even after asking you still are not sure you want to know, what her plans for you might be. You are sure of one thing; they cannot be good.

"Aw.. and give away the big surprise? But...let's just say I get very lonely without a big strong male Devimon to keep me company."

         She said as she caressed your cheek, with her human-like hand. The cheek that was still stinging. Her touch was freezing cold. The thought of her being so lonely, and you being opposite her sex chilled you to the bone itself! If it was an Angewomon, you would probably be more than obliged! But a cruel, dominate LadyDevimon seems like being a 'personal' servant to the Baroness of Hell. But that is when you remember! You do not have a choice in the matter! You might never even see home again, dwell on that fact for a minute...

"AHEM! Aren't you forgetting something?"

"F...Forgetting what?"

         You ask her. You do not have a clue, about what your new mistress could want from you. You begin to get another uneasy feeling.

"My kiss, silly!"

         She lowers her head to just inches away from yours and grins at you. You cannot believe what she just said, it does not seem like you have much choice though.

"I believe it is time to give your master her kiss!"

         Her ruby red lips are very close to yours. It should be obvious what she wants at this point. Question is, do you give it to her?
11122222112121.title: Unchain my Heart.

choices: She holds up a branding iron.
She rips your clothes off with her demon arm.
111222221121211.content:
There is no avoiding it. If you do not kiss her she may kill you. You muscle past you reflexes and pucker your lips. Bending your head forward as best you can.

         LadyDevimon wraps her human hand around your head and goes into a full-on French kiss for a good four or five seconds. The kiss leaves a horrible taste in your mouth; you feel like spitting, but fear of insulting your new mistress makes you simply bare the foul taste. She exhaled softly as she pulled away.

"Delicious"

         She licks the cheek that was slapped. Her breath smells so rotten you can hardly stand it. You stand there, completely chained and helpless. You wish that she had just left you alone. Your spirit is nearly broken in half when...
111222221121211.title: Pucker up!

choices: Tell her you do not want to be branded.
1112222211212111.content:
Wait a minute! Where did she get that branding iron?! Did it just magically appear out of thin air while you were shuddering from that kiss of hers? No matter. It was bad enough she forced her plague-infested tongue down your throat. It felt like kissing a corpse!! You could only pray she did not give you any diseases!

         But now...by the way she is brandishing that hot metal iron in the shape of an 'LD', it looked like the real fun with LadyDevimon was about to begin!

"W...w...what are you gonna do with that?!"

         You scream while still struggling to free yourself from the chains! This doesn't bother her at all. In fact, she just runs her fingers through your hair as you are shaking violently!

"As you have probably figured out by now... I am more of a... rough partner! I do hope your tiny body, is a lot stronger than it looks!"

         By the time she finished that sentence, the iron was only inches away from your chest. You could feel the intense heat omitting from it was getting warmer...and warmer...and warmer...until finally-

"Yah!"

         You flinched before it could manage to touch your skin! It is just a shame that at this point, there was nowhere you could flinch back to. If she wanted, she could leave your entire body covered in scorching hot insignias! Compared to that the stinging pain in your cheek would probably feel good!

"Aw, you poor little baby! Afraid that your mistress is gonna leave an extremely painful, hot, reminder that you are hers and hers alone?"

         Your mistress puts her fingers under your chin and raised your head facing up toward her. You would normally be screaming for help at this point, but you cannot really spare the breath. Especially, not after that nauseating kiss! But at this point, you were just about on the verge of tears.

"It won't be so bad. But if you really do not want it... I will not do it."

         The demonic Digimon 'comforts' you. She won't brand you if you do not want her to?! That actually sounds pretty generous of her!

"However, if you are a brave enough man to take one, I will gladly free you of your chains!"

"A...and you will let me go?"

         You ask. Unfortunately, she just giggles at you. That is not what you had hoped for, but you do not have too much time to think about it now.

"I never said that...but at least it will make things much more fun when playtime starts!"

         She grinned as she ran her big demon claw down your chest as if to feel you. It is very uncomfortable, especially since she stops just above your pants! You could feel her huge sharp nails hanging just above your crotch! You know LadyDevimon could tear certain parts of you at this point, but if she wants what you think she wants, she will not do it. It Will not be as fun playing with a eunuch!

         Still, you do not want, that iron touching you! It is gonna hurt a lot! But then again, if you take it, she will have the chains let go of your arms and legs. And knowing her true intent, if you do not take that iron like a man...you are gonna be completely defenseless!
1112222211212111.title: Extreme Torture Vs. Extreme Torture.

choices: You just throw up in your mouth a little.
11122222112121112.content:
This is perhaps the hardest choice you have ever had to make. On the one hand you do not want to get branded, but on the other hand, you are not sure what else she might do to you.

"Okay, go ahead."

         It is not like you really have a lot of choice at the point. You grit your teeth and brace yourself for the branding. The pain is unbearable when she presses it into your bare skin. It is so intense that your vision starts to fade.

         You forget everything else but the pain at hand, and all your thoughts concentrated on wishing this searing pain would end. When it finally stops, and you slowly come back into reality, you see LadyDevimon leaning in for another kiss. Her rancid breath, coupled with the lingering pain makes you want to throw up. You hold it in with all the might you can muster but still...
11122222112121112.title: This sucks.

111222221121211122.content:
Your barely saved from one good upchuck! You stop it the moment it reaches your mouth, and swallow it back down! It leaves a nasty taste in your mouth, but nowhere near as disgusting as your mistress's kiss did!

         Although your face failed to hide the look your disgust. Thankfully LadyDevimon kept her word and released you of your chains. Still, you were anything but relaxed. You were in extreme pain! The searing pain in your abdomen was unbearable. It could have possibly have burned your internal organs. This was by far, the worst pain you have felt in your life! You could hold back your lunch, but you could not hold back your tears any longer. You clutched the side of your stomach as you practically writhed in pain while crying.

"There there, my brave little slave. Was it really that bad? Here, give mama some sugar."

         LadyDevimon runs her fingers through your hair as if to pet you. Oh great, you are in incredible pain, and she has the nerve to demand you give her sugar?! At this point, the last thing on your mind is to make out with this demon!!

         Actually, no it is not It is not even at the bottom ten. If anything, the pain you are feeling probably is! But why?! It was the one major thing on your mind just a few seconds ago. Now it doesn't bother you anymore? Also, the scent of rigor mortis on her breath doesn't seem to bother you anymore. In fact, it smells lovely.

         LadyDevimon, she is pretty gorgeous... for a demonic Digimon. what?! What are you thinking?! She's been torturing you this whole time!! The ways she treated you were inhumane. Why would you actually even think these thoughts? You are not sure what is going on with you. It feels like strange new feelings and emotions were flowing through your body. The pain was no longer your highest concern. she was.

         You looked up at your mistress's masked face and smiled. You even reached up to remove, that black leather mask of hers. LadyDevimon actually showed no resistant. She even bent down to help you reach it easier. The face behind it was beautiful. Youthful and angelic. Though her skin was very pale and her eyes were glowing red, she still was a lovely sight. You could not resist yourself! Whatever is giving you these strange feelings made you wrap your arms around her neck, and lock your lips with hers!

         Once again, she does not resist. She even uses her demon claw to give you a boost to reach her head. This allows you to savor the embrace of her mouth even more. Your tongue is more active than hers! The disgusting taste no longer bothers you. If you did not have to stop to take a breath once in a while, you would probably never stop kissing her!

         By the looks of things, you were almost overpowering her! An ultimate-level Digimon! Even the leather face on her shoulder was dropping its jaw! LadyDevimon, on the other hand, seems to be enjoying it, judging by her satisfied moaning.

         Normally, you would quit while you are ahead, but you are not quitting. You actually want to go further! As you were mouthing your mistress, your hands were trying to undo the stitches just above her chest in her leather suit! You keep telling yourself on the inside to stop, but you are not stopping! This feeling is not letting you! What is wrong with you?!

"Oh...OHH...oh... OOHHHH-oof!"

         Unfortunately your advancing caused her to lose her balance, and fall over on the ground. Sure, you are still on top of her, but still, she is bigger, faster, and stronger than you...well, at this point, just bigger and faster!

"Oh! I'm very sorry mistress! Are you okay?"

"Did I say stop?"

         She answered your question with her own question. Well, you were doing great so far. And thanks to this feeling, surely you can go further! No point in stopping now, right?!!
111222221121211122.title: It is such a good feeling. A VERY good feeling!

choices: Your freaked out by the change.
You do not care, and keep going.
1112222211212111221.content:
You cannot explain it, but for some reason, you are physically stronger than your ultimate level mistress. You stop trying to unbutton the stitches, and simply tear them open. When you see her 'assets' you hear two voices; one screaming for you get up and run, and the other telling you to go further. you wrap your self around her. While engaged in you longest kiss yet; you tear her leather outfit even further.

         You did not think you were strong enough to tear through leather that thick so easily, but you do not care. When it finally tears all the way down it looks like something out of an STD video, for some reason, it is the most attractive thing you have ever seen. You are just about to engage when you notice that your skin is turning almost the same shade as hers...are you turning into a Devimon? Is this why she chose you?
1112222211212111221.title: Metamorphosis!

choices: Try to break free of her.
11122222112121112211.content:
This was getting too intense even for you! Not only are you finding this cruel, sadistic bitch irresistible, but now you seem to be changing into what seems to be one of her kind!!

"W...w....w...what's going on?! W....What did you do to me?!!"

"Aw..what is wrong, slave?"

         LadyDevimon tilted her head and smiled. You just glared back at her, and now feel an intense rage thanks to this change that has taken place!

"this!"

         You pointed to yourself; your pale skin was getting paler by the minute. Although you could not see it you could sense other changes in you as well...your hair began to lighten in color, your eyes were beginning to redden, and your teeth started to develop fangs! Still, LadyDevimon kept awfully calm as she said with a smile.

"Remember how I said I get lonely without a big, strong Devimon to keep me company? After all, you did agree to have my little 'stamp of approval'."

         She asked as her huge, demonic hand was stroking the hair under your chin a little. Without even thinking you just slapped her hand away, but she just began to stroke that same hair with her human-like hand.

12133222222222221222.content:
Judging by the voice of the Delphox it had to be a female. Your supposed new master was now looking at you with a neutral expression that was neither good or particularly bad. Because Delphox was a psychic type Pokemon it had spoken to you via telepathy rather than speaking aloud.

"Get out of that cage. You're coming with me, slave."

         The cage door springs open and you walk out and stand beside your new mistress. You wonder where did this Pokemon get the money to purchase you.

"Follow me."

         Delphox lead you away from the cage you were in. The two of you walk down a hallway in silence.

"I won't mistreat you as long as you obey me. I'm not a violent type normally but make me angry and I'll show you how cruel I can be."

"Yes, mistress."

         Is all you can say. Delphox eyes you for a minute as if to say something more but doesn't. The Delphox is wearing a thin smile.

"By the way, I do have a name It's Circe."

         You instantly feel a sense of foreboding as you realize that your new mistress is named after a goddess. That information makes you uneasy for some reason.

13511.title: Master Impmon.

135111.content:
When you woke up that morning you almost sprang out of bed. This was quite unprecedented since you were not a morning person, and you are always a slow riser. But today was special. Today was the day that you are going out, and capturing your first human!

         You ran to your dresser and opened your glove drawer; you started going through the usual hassle, of trying to find a matching pair. When you had found two that you thought looked especially good on you, you pulled them on and opened the bandana drawer.

         You dug through it and found your favorite one; the blue one with the evil-eye design on it and tied it around your neck. You quickly checked your appearance in the mirror. You debated about whether to put on any more accessories; you decided it was probably a bad idea, to get too weighted down. Your hunting style mostly consisted of you being swift and agile, which would be hard if you had too much junk on.

         You grabbed your favorite pair of sunglasses and put them on. It would be best to leave a good first impression, on the human you captured. You could always just tilt them up on to your head if they got in the way. You also grabbed a couple of small items, that would come in useful on the hunt.

         You carefully inserted them into the pockets of your bandana, before racing out the door. You practically flew through the dawn-lit streets, down to the big building that seemed to stretch all the way to the sky.

         You quickly typed in your clearance number on the keypad in the front; you entered the door sized for Rookies, racing across the lobby and up the flights of stairs to the room you had been in before. It was mostly empty, the two glass doors that you went in unlocked when you punched in your passcode again.

         The only thing of note in the room was an archway on the far wall; it started to shimmer and glow, revealing a portal to the human world inside. For once in your life you were early to an appointment; you were impatiently jogging in place when the BanchoLeomon instructor came in, looking very surprised to see you.

"Impmon? My my, you really do want a human badly, don't you?"

         On any other day you would have snapped at him; sarcastic and sneering, but today you just flashed him a toothy grin instead. You didn't even bother, to hide your excitement.

"You better believe it! I can not wait to have my human."

         You are soon lost in your own little world for a moment; you are thinking of all the things you would have a human do for you when they finally become your new slave.

"Impmon? Impmon! Snap out of it, you haven't caught one yet..."

         You shook your head; you eventually come back to the present and stick your tongue out at BanchoLeomon. He chuckled and shook his head at you. He soon returns, to the matter at hand.

"Alright, Impmon, you have finished your training course and got your Human Hunting License. But according to the rules, I have to go over the basics with you one more time..."

         You groaned impatiently; you knew that you had to endure this last lecture, for the moment at least. BanchoLeomon cleared his throat and began reading off the checklist on his clipboard.

"One: You may only capture one human at a time. After your captured human has been sufficiently trained and tamed, you may acquire permission to capture another one and repeat the process as often as you are allowed.

Two: Your human is inspected at certain random intervals to check on his or her well-being. and current level of obedience. If an official feels that the human needs to be returned to their habitat for any reason, they will be released without delay.

Three: You are allowed to use your human in whatever way you see fit, so long as no permanent harm occurs to your human. After all, we are hedonists, not monsters.

Four: You're permitted to capture and train your human in any way you wish, so long as you do both in a reasonable amount of time. All right, that's it..."

         He frowns at you when you pretend to have fallen asleep while standing up, then stomps over to you and smacks your rump with his clipboard. You yelp and grab your behind, but chuckle to yourself. Worth it...

"Just go."

         He points to the glowing portal in front of you. He tries to scowl, but you can see the smile of amusement he is trying to hide. You give him a mock salute and dive in. In the Human World, an abandoned monitor in the woods is overgrown with weeds. The screen flickers to life, displaying static before your gloved hand emerges and grabs hold of the grass, followed by your other hand on the edge of the monitor, and you laboriously haul yourself out to sprawl on the grass.

         You lay there panting for a few moments, the strain of traveling to the human world is not easy on you. But soon you rise and make your way through the woods, remembering what BanchoLeomon taught you. It does not take you long to reach the edge of the human city; you peer out of the bushes at all the humans hurrying by, busy with their own lives. They are totally unaware that anyone of them might be captured and enslaved, by you or any other Digmon.

         It's hard to stay calm; you're presented with hundreds of humans to choose from, and almost salivating at the thought of snagging any one of them for your own. But you remember the first rule and reluctantly resolve to capture only one. Now comes the most difficult part; You have to choose, which one to capture.
135111.title: Time to hunt!

15.content:
You're a slave trader; you procure slaves for whoever pays the highest price. You hesitated when you were first offered the opportunity, but it was too good to turn away. You never met your employer, but you do not dare question their motives. You only saw them once; they wore a strange mask, so you could not see their face. You remember them having a deep voice, and possessing a strong build.

         A pair of heavily armed bodyguards accompanied them; they carried assault rifles, and wore heavy body armor. No one ever dared approach them; a small group of prisoners had tried escaping in the past, but they met a quick and gruesome end. Your job is easy but boring and repetitive.

         You had finished dropping off your last acquisitions; you found a pair of strong-looking humans and had captured them for immediate sale. Buyers soon caught wind of them, and you received many tempting offers. You're taking a short break, and someone walks in. You grudgingly get to your feet, and inspect them...
15.title: Bringing in the slaves.

choices: Take the human to sell; keep the Digimon for yourself.
153.content:
A tall, slender man walks into the room and is under close guard by a Gazimon. You thought Gazimon did not like hanging around other humans. You're not sure how they got past the tight security, but you do not intend to report the sudden intrusion.

         You notice a strange-looking device in his hand; this human must have been a Digimon Tamer. You take the device from him and place it in your pocket. The tamer will not need it anymore, but you may find a buyer for the device. Confiscating people's possessions is a part of your job that you always enjoy. Your sure you can find a buyer for the human. You do not see many Digimon around here; maybe you should keep them for your personal use.
153.title: An intruder, or a rare opportunity?

info.brief_description: It was just another normal day, until you ended up as a slave.
info.description:
It all started like any other average day, or so you had thought. You're abducted by a Pokemon or Digimon and are now nothing except a slave to their whims. Will they be kind or are they cruel? Come read the story, and find out for yourself.

         I'm going to try something different with my parts of the story. I'm going to set up little scenarios, and the choices will affect them differently. Some older additions I made may end up changing significantly. Don't be afraid to give me feedback; I want to make the story better.

1. No dead ends. Always leave an option to keep a path open.

2. Anything goes, and that means anything.

3. Have fun, and don't be afraid to add as much as you like.

4. Ratings and reviews are more than welcome.
